executeStrategy(uint256,bytes).details: Execute a custom strategy operation with arbitrary parameters

params.actionId: The identifier of the action to perform

returns.success: Indicates whether the operation was successful

getAvailableActions().details: Get available actions that can be performed by this strategy

getPerformanceMetrics().details: Get the current performance metrics of the strategy

returns.apy: The current APY (annual percentage yield) in basis points (1% = 100)
returns.risk: Risk score from 1-5 (1 being the safest)
returns.tvl: Total value locked in the strategy

validateAction(uint256,bytes).details: Check if an action is valid for execution

returns.isValid: Whether the action can be executed with the given parameters
returns.reason: Reason if the action is invalid
